# Framework Presentation - Audience Customization Guide

## Audience Types and Customization

### Executive Leadership
**Focus**: Business value, ROI, strategic benefits
**Duration**: 30-45 minutes
**Key Content**:
- High-level architecture overview
- Business benefits and ROI
- Risk mitigation strategy
- Competitive advantages
- Resource requirements

**Avoid**:
- Technical implementation details
- Code examples
- Deep architectural discussions

### Technical Leadership
**Focus**: Architecture, implementation, migration strategy
**Duration**: 60-90 minutes
**Key Content**:
- Detailed architecture overview
- Technical benefits
- Migration approach
- Risk assessment
- Team impact

**Include**:
- Live demonstrations
- Code examples
- Technical Q&A

### Development Teams
**Focus**: Implementation details, development experience
**Duration**: 45-60 minutes
**Key Content**:
- Development workflow
- Testing approach
- Local development setup
- Framework patterns
- Knowledge repository

**Include**:
- Hands-on examples
- Debugging demonstrations
- Development tool overview

### Operations Teams
**Focus**: Deployment, monitoring, maintenance
**Duration**: 30-45 minutes
**Key Content**:
- Deployment strategy
- Version management
- Monitoring approach
- Operational benefits
- Support model

**Include**:
- Deployment demonstrations
- Monitoring examples
- Troubleshooting guides

## Content Blocks by Audience

### All Audiences
- Framework overview
- Business problem statement
- High-level benefits
- Migration timeline

### Technical Audiences Only
- Architecture deep dive
- Code examples
- Testing strategy
- Platform abstraction details

### Leadership Audiences Only
- ROI calculations
- Resource planning
- Strategic positioning
- Competitive analysis

### Developer Audiences Only
- Development workflow
- Local setup
- Debugging tools
- Knowledge repository details

## Presentation Length Adjustments

### 30-minute version
- Problem statement (5 min)
- Solution overview (10 min)
- Key benefits (10 min)
- Next steps (5 min)

### 45-minute version
- Add: Architecture overview
- Add: Migration strategy
- Add: Q&A time

### 60-minute version (CARL format)
- Context (12 min)
- Action (20 min)
- Results (15 min)
- Learning (10 min)
- Q&A (3 min)

### 90-minute version
- Add: Deep technical dive
- Add: Extended demo
- Add: Detailed Q&A
- Add: Workshop elements

## Customization Checklist

### Before Presentation
- [ ] Identify primary audience type
- [ ] Determine available time
- [ ] Select appropriate content blocks
- [ ] Customize examples for organization
- [ ] Prepare audience-specific Q&A
- [ ] Set up relevant demonstrations

### Content Customization
- [ ] Adjust technical depth
- [ ] Include relevant business metrics
- [ ] Use organization-specific examples
- [ ] Tailor migration timeline
- [ ] Customize risk assessment

### Delivery Customization
- [ ] Adjust speaking pace
- [ ] Plan interaction points
- [ ] Prepare backup slides
- [ ] Set up demo environment
- [ ] Review objection handling
